mapper.insert: insert into user(userId, userPw, userRegdate, userName, userEmail, userPhone, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3) values(#{userId}, #{userPw}, curdate(), #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where userId = #{userId}
select count(*) from user where userEmail=#{userEmail}
select userPw from user where userId = #{userId} and userName = #{userName}
select userId from user where userName = #{userName} and userEmail = #{userEmail}
